SELECT RM.RM_NUM, RSV_NO, R.MNO, M.NAME, CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, STAY_PRICE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RSV_DATE FROM RSV R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN ROOM RM ON (RM.RM_NO = R.RM_NO)
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE CHECKIN >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CHECKIN <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE CHECKOUT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CHECKOUT <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT R.RPT_TYPE, C.CN_NAME || (C.CN_MANAGER) AS NAME, IT.TYPE AS PWAY, R.RPT_DATE AS MOD_DATE, IT.SCATEGORY AS RESPONSE, TOT_PRICE, I.INAME AS MEMO FROM PUR_REQ PR LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (PR.INO = I.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE IT ON (I.TYPE_NO = IT.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON (PR.RPT_NO = R.RPT_NO) LEFT JOIN CONN C ON (I.CN_CODE = C.CN_CODE) WHERE R.RPT_STATUS = 'APPR' AND R.RPT_TYPE = 'PURCHASE'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RPT_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RPT_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
UNION
SELECT R.RPT_TYPE AS TYPE, C.CN_NAME || (C.CN_MANAGER) AS NAME, IT.TYPE AS PWAY, R.RPT_DATE AS MOD_DATE, M.NAME AS RESPONSE, TOT_PRICE AS PRICE, I.INAME AS MEMO FROM REP_REQ RR LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (RR.INO = I.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE IT ON (I.TYPE_NO = IT.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON (RR.RPT_NO = R.RPT_NO) LEFT JOIN CONN C ON (I.CN_CODE = C.CN_CODE) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MNO = R.RECEIVER) WHERE R.RPT_STATUS = 'APPR' AND R.RPT_TYPE = 'REPAIR'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RPT_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RPT_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
UNION
SELECT PAY_STATUS AS TYPE, M.NAME, PWAY, P.MOD_DATE AS MOD_DATE, NAME AS RESPONSE, PRICE AS PRICE, R.RSV_NO || ' ' || CASE WHEN R.RSV_STATUS = 'NOSHOW' THEN '노쇼' ELSE '환불' END AS MEMO FROM PAYMENT P LEFT JOIN RSV R ON (P.RSV_NO = R.RSV_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MNO = R.MNO) WHERE PAY_STATUS = 'REFUND'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(P.MOD_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(P.MOD_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY MOD_DATE

SELECT SUM(STAY_PRICE) AS STAY_PRICE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RSV_DATE, RT.RT_NO, RT_NAME FROM RSV R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN ROOM RM ON (RM.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON (RM.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO)
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailySales}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailyRoomStatus}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME) ORDER BY RT.RT_NO

SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REAL_CI, STAY_TYPE, RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME FROM STAY S LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON (S.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON (R.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO) WHERE STAY_TYPE = 'LENT'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailySales}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailyRoomStatus}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), STAY_TYPE, RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME) ORDER BY RT.RT_NO

SELECT SUM(STAY_PRICE) AS PRICE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM') AS RSV_DATE, RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME FROM RSV R LEFT JOIN ROOM RM ON (RM.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON (RM.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO)
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM')) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM')) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM') = TO_DATE(#{monthlySalesPerRoomType}, 'YYYY-MM')
GROUP BY (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(R.RSV_DATE, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM'), RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME) ORDER BY RT_NO

SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM') AS "DATE", RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME FROM STAY S LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON (S.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON (R.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO) WHERE STAY_TYPE = 'LENT'
AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM')) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM')) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM') = TO_DATE(#{monthlySalesPerRoomType}, 'YYYY-MM')
GROUP BY (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REAL_CI, 0, 7), 'YYYY-MM'), RT.RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME) ORDER BY RT_NO

SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, PWAY, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PAY_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_DATE, PAY_STATUS FROM PAYMENT
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PAY_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PAY_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailySalesCst}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY (PWAY, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PAY_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), PAY_STATUS) ORDER BY PWAY

SELECT RPT_STATUS, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPR_DATE, RPT_TYPE, SUM(TOT_PRICE) AS TOT_PRICE, TYPE FROM PUR_REQ PR LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON (R.RPT_NO = PR.RPT_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (I.INO = PR.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE IT ON (I.TYPE_NO = IT.TYPE_NO) WHERE RPT_TYPE = 'PURCHASE' AND RPT_STATUS = 'APPR'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailySpendStrg}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY RPT_STATUS, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), RPT_TYPE, TYPE
UNION
SELECT RPT_STATUS, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPR_DATE, RPT_TYPE, SUM(TOT_PRICE) AS TOT_PRICE, TYPE FROM REP_REQ RR LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON (RR.RPT_NO = R.RPT_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM I ON (I.INO = RR.INO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_TYPE IT ON (I.TYPE_NO = IT.TYPE_NO) WHERE RPT_STATUS = 'APPR' AND RPT_TYPE = 'REPAIR'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{dailySpendStrg}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY RPT_STATUS, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(APPR_DATE, 0, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), RPT_TYPE, TYPE
